title: [The history of Cleomines and Iuliet.]
author: Phillips, John, fl. 1570-1591.
notes: MiU quotes the Bishop checklist as stating that actual title reads: A rare and strange historical novel of Cleomenes and Sophonisba surnamed Juliet.
Identified as STC 19874a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
